properties.name: poussecafe.spring.pulsar.broker
properties.description: Connection URL of the Pulsar broker

properties.name: poussecafe.spring.pulsar.subscriptionTopics
properties.description: Comma-separated list of topics to subscribe to

properties.name: poussecafe.spring.pulsar.subscriptionName
properties.description: Subscription name used by the consumer

properties.name: poussecafe.spring.pulsar.defaultPublicationTopic
properties.description: The default topic used to public messages to
